data.name: Circle Empires Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: Composed by our composer Sigurd Jøhnk-Jensen from Iceland, this original soundtrack contains the 8 tracks for Circle Empires Rivals game.  Please consider supporting him by getting this soundtrack.
data.about_the_game: Composed by our composer Sigurd Jøhnk-Jensen from Iceland, this original soundtrack contains the 8 tracks for Circle Empires Rivals game.  Please consider supporting him by getting this soundtrack.
data.short_description: Composed by our composer Sigurd Jøhnk-Jensen from Iceland, this original soundtrack contains the 8 tracks for Circle Empires Rivals game. Please consider supporting him by getting this soundtrack.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 227 MB available space
